title: Plano-pnigmos, or, A gag for Johnson that published animadversions upon Galen-pale and, a scourge for that pitiful fellow Mr. Galen that dictated to him a scurrillous Greek title / by Geo. Thomson.
author: Thomson, George, fl. 1648-1679.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by R. Wood for Edward Thomas,
